text: Sheep Hero () is a 2018 Dutch documentary film directed by Ton van Zantvoort. In July 2019, it was shortlisted as one of the nine films in contention to be the Dutch entry for the Academy Award for Best International Feature Film at the 92nd Academy Awards, but it was not selected. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2018 films Category:2018 documentary films Category:Dutch films Category:Dutch documentary films Category:Dutch-language films
title: Sheep Hero
